Package com.client.game.Managers

Class GameManager

java.lang.Object
com.client.game.Managers.GameManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
IObservable
public class GameManager extends Object implements IObservable
Controls the game events. This class connect GUI to backend of the game What each method does is understandable from their names. this class manager of the game. this class is determining next player or game finish or not also this class is do some connection between space and player this class is single and needed to reached from other classes so we use singleton
